sentences.chinese: 我回来再告诉你这一切。

sentences.english: Sheppard was telling the truth .
sentences.chinese: 谢泼德说的是实话。

detailed_translations.english: if someone tells you something, they communicate information, a story, their feelings etc to you

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tell)人名；(英、德、瑞典)特尔；(罗、意)泰尔；(阿拉伯)塔勒

name: truth
trans: n. 真理；事实；诚实；实质

sentences.english: How do we know you’re telling us the truth?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎么知道你告诉我们的是真话？

sentences.english: The experience has taught us some basic truths.
sentences.chinese: 这次经历教会我们一些基本的道理。

sentences.english: How do we know you’re telling us the truth?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎么知道你告诉我们的是真话？

detailed_translations.english: the true facts about something, rather than what is untrue, imagined, or guessed

name: either
trans: conj. 也（用于否定句或否定词组后）；根本
adj. 两者之中任一的；两者之中每一的
pron. 任一，两方，随便哪一个；两者中的一个或另一个

sentences.english: You can park on either side of the street.
sentences.chinese: 这条街两边都可停车。

detailed_translations.english: one or the other of two; it does not matter which

sentences.english: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.english: Secondly,put some tomato paste on the bread.
sentences.chinese: 第二，放一些西红柿在面包上粘贴。

sentences.english: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

detailed_translations.english: a round soft red fruit eaten raw or cooked as a vegetable

name: potato
trans: n. [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯

sentences.english: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

detailed_translations.chinese: [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯
detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground

name: cabbage
trans: n. 卷心菜，甘蓝菜，洋白菜；（俚)脑袋；（非正式、侮辱）植物人（常用于英式英语）；（俚）钱，尤指纸币（常用于美式俚语）

sentences.english: I like peas more than cabbage .
sentences.chinese: 比起卷心菜我更喜欢豌豆。

sentences.english: We have cabbage and mutton.
sentences.chinese: 我们有卷心菜和羊肉。

sentences.english: We have fresh cabbage, celery, lettuce and spinach.
sentences.chinese: 有新鲜的卷心菜、芹菜、生菜和菠菜。

detailed_translations.english: a large round vegetable with thick green or purple leaves

name: lettuce
trans: n. [园艺] 生菜；莴苣；（美）纸币

sentences.english: Do you like lettuce in sandwiches?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢在三明治里放生菜吗？

sentences.english: Do you like lettuce in sandwiches?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢吃莴苣三明治吗?。

sentences.english: We have fresh cabbage, celery, lettuce and spinach.
sentences.chinese: 有新鲜的卷心菜、芹菜、生菜和菠菜。

detailed_translations.english: a round vegetable with thin green leaves eaten raw in salads

sentences.english: roast chicken with peas and carrots
sentences.chinese: 烤鸡配豌豆胡萝卜

detailed_translations.english: a round green seed that is cooked and eaten as a vegetable, or the plant on which these seeds grow

name: bean
trans: n. 豆；嘴峰；毫无价值的东西

sentences.english: baked beans
sentences.chinese: 烘豆

sentences.english: Soak the beans overnight.
sentences.chinese: 把豆子浸泡一夜。

sentences.english: kidney beans
sentences.chinese: 芸豆

sentences.english: green beans
sentences.chinese: 青刀豆，四季豆

detailed_translations.chinese: 豆；嘴峰；毫无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: a seed or a  pod (=  case containing seeds  )  , that comes from a climbing plant and is cooked as food. There are very many types of beans.
to hit someone on the head with an object

sentences.english: Pick an orange, pick a pear.
sentences.chinese: 摘一个橙子，摘一个梨子。

sentences.english: I took this apple for a pear until I tasted it.
sentences.chinese: 我误将这个苹果当作梨子，直到我尝了才知道。

sentences.english: Is it a pear?
sentences.chinese: 这是一个梨子吗？

detailed_translations.english: a sweet juicy fruit that has a round base and is thinner near the top, or the tree that produces this fruit

name: grape
trans: n. 葡萄；葡萄酒；葡萄树；葡萄色

sentences.english: a bunch of grapes
sentences.chinese: 一串葡萄

sentences.english: grape juice
sentences.chinese: 葡萄汁

sentences.english: red seedless grapes
sentences.chinese: 红色无籽葡萄

detailed_translations.english: one of a number of small round green or purple fruits that grow together on a  vine . Grapes are often used for making wine

name: peach
trans: n. 桃子；桃树；桃红色；受人喜欢的人（或物）
adj. 桃色的；用桃子制成的

sentences.english: Those boys rifled the peach trees in our garden.
sentences.chinese: 那些男孩子把我们花园里的桃树抢摘光了。

sentences.english: The peach trees cast all their blossoms after the heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 大雨过后，桃花全部落掉。

sentences.english: There are a few apple trees scattered among these peach trees.
sentences.chinese: 这片桃树中杂有几棵苹果树。

detailed_translations.english: a round juicy fruit that has a soft yellow or red skin and a large, hard seed in the centre, or the tree that this fruit grows on

sentences.english: Alexander the Great beat every opponent between Greece and India.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大大帝打败了希腊和印度之间的每个敌手。

sentences.english: Spain and Greece have not.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙和希腊还没有。

sentences.english: But there are no special arrangements for Greece or for any other country.
sentences.chinese: 但是对于希腊和任何别的国家，我们都不会特别对待。

name: climate
trans: n. 气候；风气；思潮；风土

sentences.english: Los Angeles’ warm dry climate
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶温暖干燥的气候

detailed_translations.chinese: 气候； 风土， 地带； 风气， 气氛
detailed_translations.english: the typical weather conditions in a particular area

name: country
trans: n. 国家，国土；国民；乡下，农村；乡村；故乡
adj. 祖国的，故乡的；地方的，乡村的；国家的；粗鲁的；乡村音乐的

sentences.english: the Scandinavian countries
sentences.chinese: 斯堪的纳维亚国家

sentences.english: developing countries
sentences.chinese: 发展中国家

sentences.english: travelling to a foreign country
sentences.chinese: 到国外旅行

sentences.english: I’ve always wanted to live in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想住在乡下。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is controlled by its own government, president, king etc

name: pleasant
trans: adj. 令人愉快的，舒适的；讨人喜欢的，和蔼可亲的

sentences.english: It had been a pleasant evening.
sentences.chinese: 那是个愉快的夜晚。

sentences.english: the pleasant climate of Southern California
sentences.chinese: 南加利福尼亚的宜人气候

sentences.english: The restaurant was large and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅宽敞舒适。

sentences.english: Kate! What a pleasant surprise !
sentences.chinese: 凯特！真是让人惊喜！

detailed_translations.english: enjoyable or attractive and making you feel happy

name: weather
trans: n. 天气；气象；气候；处境
vt. 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
vi. 风化；受侵蚀；经受风雨

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

name: spring
trans: n. 春天；弹簧；泉水；活力；跳跃
vt. 使跳起；使爆炸；突然提出；使弹开
vi. 生长；涌出；跃出；裂开

sentences.english: He sprang to his feet (= stood up suddenly ) and rushed after her.
sentences.chinese: 他腾地站起身，冲过去追她。

sentences.english: There are several hot springs in the area.
sentences.chinese: 这地区有几处温泉。

sentences.english: With a spring, the cat leapt on to the table.
sentences.chinese: 猫一跃跳上桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly and quickly in a particular direction, especially by jumping
a place where water comes up naturally from the ground

name: windy
trans: adj. 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的

sentences.english: It’s too windy for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 风太大，不适合野餐。

sentences.english: a cold, windy day
sentences.chinese: 一个寒冷的大风天

sentences.english: a windy hillside
sentences.chinese: 当风的山坡

detailed_translations.chinese: 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的
detailed_translations.english: if it is windy, there is a lot of wind

name: warm
trans: vt. 使…兴奋；使…温暖；使…感兴趣

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.english: I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water
sentences.chinese: 温水

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

name: rain
trans: vt. 大量地给；使大量落下

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
sentences.chinese: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.english: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.chinese: 外面仍在下雨。

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

sentences.english: I sometimes have to work late.
sentences.chinese: 我有时得工作到很晚。

sentences.english: Sometimes, Grandma would tell us stories about her childhood in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，祖母会跟我们讲讲她儿时在意大利的经历。

sentences.english: ‘Do you ever wish you were back in Japan?’ ‘Sometimes. Not very often.’
sentences.chinese: “你有没有想过希望回到日本？”“有时候吧，但不经常这么想。”

sentences.english: The journey takes an hour, sometimes even longer.
sentences.chinese: 路上需要一小时，有时甚至更长。

detailed_translations.english: on some occasions but not always

sentences.english: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.english: Food must be refrigerated in summer.
sentences.chinese: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.english: After a summer here the poorest sheep and cattle grow strong and fat.
sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

name: autumn
trans: n. 秋天；成熟期；渐衰期，凋落期

sentences.english: autumn mists
sentences.chinese: 秋天的雾霭

detailed_translations.english: the season between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes cooler

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

detailed_translations.english: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest

name: snow
trans: vt. 使纷纷落下；使变白

sentences.english: Snow was falling heavily as we entered the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们进村的时候雪下得正大。

sentences.english: I could see footprints in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我看到雪地里有脚印。

sentences.english: The town was buried under three feet of snow.
sentences.chinese: 小镇被三英尺厚的积雪覆盖着。

detailed_translations.english: soft white pieces of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather and cover the ground
if it snows, snow falls from the sky

sentences.english: We always have snow in January.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里1月份总会下雪。

detailed_translations.english: the first month of the year, between December and February

sentences.english: He joined the Army in February 1943.
sentences.chinese: 他1943年2月参军。

detailed_translations.english: the second month of the year, between January and March

sentences.english: She started work here last March.
sentences.chinese: 她去年3月开始在这儿工作。

detailed_translations.english: the third month of the year, between February and April

sentences.english: You can paint, do repairs, and if you have already hired contractors in April or earlier, continue to work on your plans.
sentences.chinese: 你可以涂涂油漆，做点小修补，如果你已经在四月或更加之前就已经雇到承包商的话，按原计划进行没关系。

sentences.english: This past April while visiting my parents on the farm I’d grown up on, I wandered outside to drink in the feel of “home”, a comfort I really needed right then.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚过去的那个四月，我回到我在那长大的农场探望我的父母。 我在屋外漫步，沉浸在“家”的舒适感觉中——当时我真的很需要家的慰藉。

detailed_translations.english: the fourth month of the year, between March and May

name: May
trans: aux. 可以，能够；可能，也许；祝，愿；会，能

sentences.english: Graduation ceremonies are held in early May.
sentences.chinese: 毕业典礼在5月初举行。

detailed_translations.english: the fifth month of the year, between April and June

name: June
trans: n. 六月；琼（人名，来源于拉丁语，含义是“年轻气盛的六月”）

sentences.english: He spent two and a half weeks with us in June 1986.
sentences.chinese: 1986年6月，他和我们呆了两个半星期。

detailed_translations.english: the sixth month of the year, between May and July

sentences.english: But from February through July, Joy sat around with nothing to do.
sentences.chinese: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.english: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.chinese: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.english: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.chinese: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。

name: August
trans: adj. 威严的；令人敬畏的

sentences.english: He moved to another city last August.
sentences.chinese: 去年八月，他搬到另一座城市。

sentences.english: That night in August, waiting for the Rolling Stones to come on stage, we felt like rebels.
sentences.chinese: 在那个八月的夜晚，在等待滚石乐队登台演出时，我们有种造反的感觉。

sentences.english: They make a huge migration from the north to the south of the US, mostly starting in August and the other way around in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 大部分是从八月开始，它们开始进行巨大的迁徙，从美国的北部到南部，而到了春天又沿相反方向回来。

detailed_translations.english: the eighth month of the year, between July and September

sentences.english: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.chinese: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.english: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.chinese: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.english: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

detailed_translations.english: the ninth month of the year, between August and October

sentences.english: Most seasonal hiring is done in early October.
sentences.chinese: 多数季节性招聘是在10月初进行。

detailed_translations.english: the tenth month of the year, between September and November

sentences.english: And again in November.
sentences.chinese: 在十一月又一次。

sentences.english: Too much snow in November.
sentences.chinese: 太多的大雪在十一月。

detailed_translations.english: the 11th month of the year, between October and December

sentences.english: In the dark of December.
sentences.chinese: 在十二月的黑夜里。

sentences.english: Our summers are short and our winters long.In December, when it is darkest, we only have a few hours of very weak sunlight per day.
sentences.chinese: 我们的夏天很短但是冬天很长，在十二月，也就是最黑的时候，我们的一天中只有很短的时间可以看到微弱的阳光。

sentences.english: I send out Valentine’s cards with the girls’ photo, instead of trying to mail cards in December.
sentences.chinese: ——我寄出有女孩子照片的情人节贺卡，以代替试图在十二月寄出的贺卡。

detailed_translations.english: the 12th month of the year, between November and January

name: the U.S.
trans: n. 美利坚合众国，美国

name: Brazil
trans: n. 巴西（拉丁美洲国家）

sentences.english: Brazil has a big surplus of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 巴西有很多剩余咖啡。

sentences.english: Today's football match is France versus Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 今天的足球赛是法国队对巴西队。

sentences.english: Brazil has thrown up many world-famous footballers.
sentences.chinese: 巴西出了许多闻名世界的足球运动员。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Holland?
sentences.chinese: 你曾经去过荷兰吗？

sentences.english: I think my mother’s grandfather came from Holland or something.
sentences.chinese: 我想我母亲的祖父来自荷兰或者什么地方。

sentences.english: But on this occasion the fortune he previously enjoyed in World Cup finals with Holland, Australia and South Korea eluded him.
sentences.chinese: 但是这个时候运气离开了他尽管他之前享受着带领荷兰，澳大利亚，韩国打进世界杯决赛圈。

detailed_translations.english: a division of the United Kingdom

sentences.english: Germany borders on France.
sentences.chinese: 德国与法国接壤。

sentences.english: Bismarck ruled Germany by a strong hand.
sentences.chinese: 俾斯麦用铁腕手段统治德国。

sentences.english: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 新纳粹主义正在德国的一些地方复活。

name: Italy
trans: n. 意大利（欧洲南部国家）

sentences.english: They decided to swan around Italy this summer.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定今年夏天去意大利游逛。

sentences.english: French troops negotiated the Alps and went on the road in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.english: All the newspapers reported on the football match of France versus Italy.
sentences.chinese: 所有的报纸都报道了法国队对意大利队的足球比赛。

sentences.english: Sweden borders Norway and Finland.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典与挪威、芬兰接壤。

sentences.english: We come from Norway.
sentences.chinese: 我们来自挪威。

sentences.english: They tried to chart the sea area between Norway and Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 他们企图绘制挪威与丹麦之间的海域图。

sentences.english: This program is beamed at Russia.
sentences.chinese: 这套节目是对俄罗斯广播的。

sentences.english: That transmitter was beamed at Russia.
sentences.chinese: 那台发射机曾用于对俄罗斯广播。

sentences.english: He was doubling for America and Russia.
sentences.chinese: 他给美国和俄罗斯当双重间谍。

sentences.english: They are touring in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在西班牙旅游。

sentences.english: She chose Spain, but personally I'd prefer to go to France.
sentences.chinese: 她选择了西班牙，而我个人倒更愿意去法国。

sentences.english: This island was ceded to Spain more than one hundred years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛屿在一百多年以前就割让给西班牙了。

sentences.english: Sweden borders Norway and Finland.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典与挪威、芬兰接壤。

sentences.english: During a holiday in Sweden， I found this note on my car： 'sir， we welcome you to our city.
sentences.chinese: 有一次在瑞典度假，我发现我的车上有这样一个字条："先生，欢迎您光临我们的城市。

sentences.english: Why did you choose Sweden for the procedure?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你会选择在瑞典进行治疗

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed

name: arrive
trans: vi. 到达；成功；达成；出生

sentences.english: Give me a call to let me know you’ve arrived safely.
sentences.chinese: 打个电话给我，告诉我你已平安到达。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived on the scene, the burglars had fled.
sentences.chinese: 警方赶到现场时，窃贼已经逃跑了。

sentences.english: When her wedding day arrived, she was really nervous.
sentences.chinese: 到了婚礼那天，她十分紧张。

detailed_translations.english: to get to the place you are going to

name: night
trans: n. 夜晚，晚上；黑暗，黑夜

sentences.english: It was a cold moonlit night.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒冷的月夜。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep too well last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚睡得不太好。

detailed_translations.english: the dark part of each 24-hour period when the sun cannot be seen and when most people sleep

sentences.english: It's already 9 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 已经9点钟了。

sentences.english: The meeting is at 10 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 开会时间是10点钟。

detailed_translations.english: one of the times when the clock shows the exact hour as a number from 1 to 12

sentences.english: a barber’s shop
sentences.chinese: 理发店

sentences.english: a fish-and-chip shop
sentences.chinese: 炸鱼薯条店

sentences.english: the local shops
sentences.chinese: 当地的商店

sentences.english: Shirley saw her reflection in the shop window.
sentences.chinese: 雪莉在商店橱窗里看到了自己的影像。

sentences.english: I’m just going down to the shops .
sentences.chinese: 我正要去商店。

detailed_translations.english: a building or part of a building where you can buy things, food, or services
to go to one or more shops to buy things

name: moment
trans: n. 片刻，瞬间，时刻；重要，契机

sentences.english: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.english: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.chinese: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.english: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.english: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.chinese: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.english: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.english: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.english: It was quiet for a moment, then Rae spoke.
sentences.chinese: 沉寂了片刻，然后雷开始说话了。

detailed_translations.english: a particular point in time

name: envelope
trans: n. 信封，封皮；包膜；[天] 包层；包迹

sentences.english: envelopes and stamps
sentences.chinese: 信封和邮票

sentences.english: She tore open the envelope and frantically read the letter.
sentences.chinese: 她撕开信封慌忙看信。

sentences.english: He got a job stuffing envelopes (= filling them with letters ) at the campaign headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 他找了一份在竞选总部装信封的工作。

detailed_translations.english: a thin paper cover in which you put and send a letter

sentences.english: He’s a small boy, about John’s size.
sentences.chinese: 他是个小男孩，个子和约翰差不多。

sentences.english: Jensens’ house is about the same size as ours.
sentences.chinese: 詹森的房子和我们的差不多大。

sentences.english: He’s quite a big dog, but he’s still not full size yet.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗体型很大，但还没有长足。

detailed_translations.english: how big or small something is
to sort according to size

name: pad
trans: n. 衬垫；护具；便笺簿；填补

sentences.english: Use an abrasive pad for stubborn stains.
sentences.chinese: 用百洁布擦洗顽固污渍。

sentences.english: Keep a telephone pad and a pen to hand.
sentences.chinese: 手边准备一本电话记事簿和一支笔。

sentences.english: All the sharp corners were padded with foam.
sentences.chinese: 所有的棱角都垫上了泡沫塑料。

detailed_translations.english: a thick flat object made of cloth or rubber, used to protect or clean something, or to make something more comfortable
to put a layer of soft material in or on sth in order to protect it, make it thicker or change its shape

name: glue
trans: vt. 粘合；似胶般固着于

sentences.english: a tube of glue
sentences.chinese: 一管胶水

sentences.english: The sheets are glued together with strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 薄板用强力胶粘在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a sticky substance used for joining things together
to join two things together using glue

name: chalk
trans: n. 粉笔；白垩；用粉笔划的记号
vt. 用粉笔写；用白垩粉擦；记录；规划

sentences.english: He chalked the message on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他用粉笔把这条消息写在黑板上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用粉笔写；用白垩粉擦；记录；规划
detailed_translations.english: to write, mark, or draw something with chalk

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉笔；白垩；用粉笔划的记号
detailed_translations.english: soft white or grey rock formed a long time ago from the shells of small sea animals

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

name: feel
trans: vt. 感觉；认为；触摸；试探

sentences.english: I am feeling very depressed.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Suddenly I felt a sharp pain in my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我突然感到肩部一阵剧痛。

sentences.english: I felt as if all my strength had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得好象自己的力气已经全没了。

sentences.english: I felt like I was being kicked in the teeth every day.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉我好像每天都在经受挫折。

detailed_translations.english: If you feel a particular emotion or physical sensation, you experience it
to give you a particular physical feeling, especially when you touch or hold something

name: look
trans: vt. 看；期待；注意；面向；看上去像
vi. 看；看起来；注意；面向

sentences.english: We sneaked out while Jessie’s mom wasn’t looking.
sentences.chinese: 我们趁杰茜的妈妈没有看到，偷偷地溜了出去。

sentences.english: If you look carefully you can see that the painting represents a human figure.
sentences.chinese: 如果仔细看，就会看出画上是一个人形。

sentences.english: Gina covered her eyes, afraid to look.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜捂住眼睛，不敢看。

sentences.english: Let me have a look at that – I think it’s mine.
sentences.chinese: 让我看一下那个东西——我想它是我的。

detailed_translations.english: to turn your eyes towards something, so that you can see it
an act of looking at something

name: must
trans: aux. 必须，一定；可以，应当；很可能
n. 绝对必要的事物；未发酵葡萄汁

sentences.english: All passengers must wear seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.english: It’s getting late. I really must go.
sentences.chinese: 天晚了，我真的必须走了。

sentences.english: You must work hard.
sentences.chinese: 你必须努力工作。

sentences.english: We must all be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我们都必须耐心。

sentences.english: Must I pay now?
sentences.chinese: 我必须现在付款吗？

sentences.english: For the engine to work, the green lever must be in the ‘up’ position.
sentences.chinese: 要启动引擎，绿色操纵杆必须在“上”这一挡。

sentences.english: Accidents must be reported to the safety officer.
sentences.chinese: 出了事故必须向安全员报告。

detailed_translations.english: to have to do something because it is necessary or important, or because of a law or order

name: call
trans: n. 电话；呼叫；要求；访问

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

name: doctor
trans: vt. 修理；篡改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位

sentences.english: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law
sentences.chinese: 法学博士

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

name: telephone
trans: n. （美）电话；电话机；电话耳机

sentences.english: The telephone rang just as I was leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我正要走，电话铃响了。

detailed_translations.english: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place
to talk to someone by telephone

name: remember
trans: vt. 记得；牢记；纪念；代…问好

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

name: mouth
trans: vt. 做作地说，装腔作势地说；喃喃地说出

sentences.english: He lifted his glass to his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 他把玻璃杯举到嘴边。

sentences.english: Liam was fast asleep with his mouth wide open.
sentences.chinese: 利亚姆大张着嘴，睡得很熟。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your face which you put food into, or which you use for speaking

sentences.english: Joe ran his tongue over his dry lips.
sentences.chinese: 乔舔了舔干燥的嘴唇。

sentences.english: The taste of the chocolate was still on her tongue.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力的余味依然留在她的舌尖。

sentences.english: The girl scowled at me, then stuck out her tongue .
sentences.chinese: 女孩怒视着我，然后吐了一下舌头。

detailed_translations.english: the soft part inside your mouth that you can move about and use for eating and speaking
to use your tongue to make separate sounds when playing a musical instrument

name: bad
trans: adj. 坏的；严重的；劣质的
adv. 很，非常；坏地；邪恶地

sentences.english: I have some bad news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有坏消息要告诉你。

sentences.english: I thought things couldn’t possibly get any worse.
sentences.chinese: 我想事情最坏也不过如此了。

sentences.english: The plane was delayed for several hours by bad weather.
sentences.chinese: 天气不好，飞机延误了好几个小时。

sentences.english: It’s difficult to break bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 坏习惯很难改。

sentences.english: a bad smell
sentences.chinese: 难闻的气味

detailed_translations.english: unpleasant or likely to cause problems

name: cold
trans: adj. 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.english: a blast of cold air
sentences.chinese: 一股冷空气

sentences.english: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.english: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.chinese: 我冷得发抖。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

name: news
trans: n. 新闻，消息；新闻报导

sentences.english: a late evening news broadcast
sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻节目

sentences.english: I hope to have some good news for you soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望很快就能给你好消息。

detailed_translations.english: reports of recent events in the newspapers or on the radio or television

name: headache
trans: n. 头痛；麻烦；令人头痛之事

sentences.english: If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The airline's biggest headache is the increase in the price of aviation fuel.
sentences.chinese: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in your head

name: aspirin
trans: n. 阿司匹林（解热镇痛药）

sentences.english: The nurse dosed the patient with aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 护士给病人服阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The nurse dosed out aspirin to a patient.
sentences.chinese: 护士给病人服阿司匹林。

sentences.english: She dosed him with non-aspirin tablets to reduce the fever.
sentences.chinese: 她让他服用非阿司匹林药片降温退烧。

detailed_translations.english: a medicine that reduces pain,  inflammation  , and fever

sentences.english: I’ve got terrible earache and a sore throat.
sentences.chinese: 我耳朵疼得厉害，喉咙也痛。

detailed_translations.english: a pain inside your ear

sentences.english: I’ve got toothache .
sentences.chinese: 我牙痛。

sentences.english: I had terrible toothache all last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我一整夜牙疼得厉害。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in a tooth

sentences.english: Visit your dentist twice a year for a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 每年看两次牙医做检查。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to treat people’s teeth

sentences.english: They have a stomach ache, or diarrhea, or their grilled cheese sandwiches "tasted funny" or "didn't look right.
sentences.chinese: 他们胃痛，或腹泻，或者说他们的烤芝士三明治味道很奇怪或看上起不对劲。

detailed_translations.english: If you have a stomach ache, you have a pain in your stomach

name: medicine
trans: vt. 用药物治疗；给…用药

sentences.english: Medicines should be kept out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 药应放在孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.english: She studied medicine at Johns Hopkins University.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在约翰•霍普金斯大学学医。

sentences.english: the remarkable achievements of modern medicine
sentences.chinese: 现代医学的非凡成就

detailed_translations.english: a substance used for treating illness, especially a liquid you drink

name: temperature
trans: n. 温度；体温；气温；发烧

sentences.english: The temperature of the water was just right for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 这水温游泳正好。

sentences.english: Water boils at a temperature of 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 水在100摄氏度沸腾。

sentences.english: The nurse took (= measured ) my temperature .
sentences.chinese: 护士给我量了体温。

detailed_translations.english: a measure of how hot or cold a place or thing is

sentences.english: Steven’s still in bed with flu .
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文患了流感，仍卧病在床。

sentences.english: She’s got the flu .
sentences.chinese: 她得了流感。

sentences.english: I couldn’t go because I had flu .
sentences.chinese: 我得了流感，去不了。

sentences.english: Doctors now fear a flu epidemic .
sentences.chinese: 医生现在担心会出现流感大爆发。

detailed_translations.english: a common illness that makes you feel very tired and weak, gives you a sore throat, and makes you cough and have to clear your nose a lot

sentences.english: These antibodies work against the measles virus.
sentences.chinese: 这些抗体有对抗麻疹病毒作用。

sentences.english: This is why many viruses, such as measles, make us ill only once.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么许多病毒，如麻疹，只会使我们生病一次。

sentences.english: Imagine if we have an outbreak of measles and the information is relayed to us three months after the outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 想像一下如果我们已经爆发了麻疹，而消息是在爆发后的三个月后才传到我们这里。

detailed_translations.english: an infectious illness in which you have a fever and small red spots on your face and body. People often have measles when they are children.

name: mumps
trans: n. [内科] 流行性腮腺炎；愠怒；生气

sentences.english: How do I know which mumps vaccine I or my child should be vaccinated with?
sentences.chinese: 如何知道我或我的孩子该接种何种流行性腮腺炎疫苗？

detailed_translations.chinese: [内科] 流行性腮腺炎；愠怒；生气
detailed_translations.english: an infectious illness which makes your neck swell and become painful

name: better
trans: n. 长辈；较好者；打赌的人（等于bettor）
adv. 更好的；更多的；较大程度地

sentences.english: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.english: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.chinese: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.english: He can speak French a lot better than I can.
sentences.chinese: 他法语讲得比我好多了。

detailed_translations.english: more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc
to a higher standard or quality

name: certainly
trans: adv. 当然；行（用于回答）；必定

sentences.english: They’re certainly not mine.
sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.english: ‘I’d like a beer, please.’ ‘Certainly, sir.’
sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.english: ‘Can I come along?’ ‘Certainly.’
sentences.chinese: “我可以一起去吗？”“当然可以。”

detailed_translations.english: without doubt

name: get up
trans: na. 起床；起身；站起来；叫…起床

sentences.english: I got up and walked over to where he was.
sentences.chinese: 我站起来，走到他那里。

sentences.english: They have to get up early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 他们一大早就得起床。

detailed_translations.english: When someone who is sitting or lying down gets up, they rise to a standing position

sentences.english: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.chinese: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.english: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.chinese: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said

name: rich
trans: adj. 富有的；肥沃的；昂贵的
adj. 油腻的，含有很多脂肪

sentences.english: Rich mineral deposits have been found in the sea bed.
sentences.chinese: 海底发现有丰富的矿床。

sentences.english: Red meat is a rich source of iron.
sentences.chinese: 红肉含有大量铁质。

sentences.english: This is a system in which the rich are taken care of and the poor are left to suffer.
sentences.chinese: 这是个富人受关照，而穷人遭罪的制度。

detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of something

detailed_translations.chinese: (Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什
detailed_translations.english: The rich are rich people

sentences.english: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅物美价廉。

sentences.english: I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.english: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物，食品；养料，精神食粮
detailed_translations.english: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat

name: remain
trans: vi. 保持；依然；留下；剩余；逗留；残存

sentences.english: The refugees were allowed to remain in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 难民获准留在英国。

sentences.english: They were cleaning up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在打扫野餐的残余物。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in the same place without moving away

detailed_translations.chinese: 残余； 残骸； 遗迹
detailed_translations.english: Theremainsof something are the parts of it that are left after most of it has been taken away or destroyed

name: play
trans: vt. 游戏；扮演；演奏；播放；同…比赛
vi. 演奏；玩耍；上演；参加比赛

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

name: match
trans: vt. 使比赛；使相配；敌得过，比得上；相配；与…竞争
vi. 比赛；匹配；相配，相称；相比
n. 比赛，竞赛；匹配；对手；火柴

sentences.english: It’s our last match of the season.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.english: They’re preparing for a big match tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为明天的一场大赛做准备。

sentences.english: McClaire’s goal earned him the title of man of the match (= the person in a team who plays best ) .
sentences.chinese: 麦克莱尔的进球为他赢得了“本场最佳球员”的称号。

sentences.english: Carlos was no match for the champion.
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯根本不是冠军的对手。

detailed_translations.english: an organized sports event between two teams or people

sentences.english: I could hear Sarah and Andy talking in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 我听到萨拉和安迪在隔壁讲话。

sentences.english: Sue and Bob still aren’t talking (= are refusing to talk to each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 休和鲍勃仍然互不理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to say things to someone as part of a conversation
to say things to someone as part of a conversation

name: library
trans: n. 图书馆，藏书室；文库

sentences.english: a public library
sentences.chinese: 公共图书馆

sentences.english: a library book
sentences.chinese: 图书馆的书

sentences.english: My thanks go to the British School of Osteopathy, for the use of their library.
sentences.chinese: 感谢不列颠骨疗法学校允许我使用他们的藏书。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building containing books that can be looked at or borrowed

name: drive
trans: n. 驱动器；驾车；[心理] 内驱力，推进力；快车道
vt. 推动，发动（机器等）；驾驶（马车，汽车等）；驱赶

sentences.english: Can you drive?
sentences.chinese: 你会开车吗？

sentences.english: We watched Dad drive the posts into the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着爸爸把木桩打入地里。

sentences.english: With a few loud whistles, they drove the donkeys out of the enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 随着几声响亮的哨声，他们把驴子赶出了围栏。

detailed_translations.english: to make a car, truck, bus etc move along

name: so
trans: adv. 如此，这么；确是如此

sentences.english: The troops will not advance until ordered to do so .
sentences.chinese: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.english: Did Luke sell them? And, if so , what happened to the money?
sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Has he lost a fortune?’ ‘ So they say .’
sentences.chinese: “他输掉了一大笔钱吗？”“他们是这么说的。”

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

sentences.english: Parents can withdraw their child from school if they so wish .
sentences.chinese: 家长要是愿意，可以让孩子退学。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer back to an idea, action, quality, situation etc that has just been mentioned
used to say that someone does something because of the reason just stated

sentences.english: We need to get this finished as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽快完成此事。

sentences.english: Kids grow up so quickly these days.
sentences.chinese: 现在的孩子长得真快啊。

detailed_translations.english: fast

name: lean out of
trans: 身体探出；从……探出身；身体深处

name: break
trans: vi. 打破；折断；弄坏；削弱
vt. （使）破；打破（纪录）；（常指好天气）突变；开始
vi. （嗓音）突变；突破；破晓；（价格）突然下跌
n. 破裂；间断；（持续一段时间的状况的）改变；间歇

sentences.english: I had to break a window to get into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我只得打破一扇窗户进屋。

detailed_translations.english: if you break something, you make it separate into two or more pieces, for example by hitting it, dropping it, or bending it

name: noise
trans: n. [环境] 噪音；响声；杂音
vi. 发出声音；大声议论

sentences.english: What’s that noise?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么声音？

sentences.english: Try not to make a noise when you go upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 上楼时尽量不要弄出声。

sentences.english: There was a lot of noise outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面很吵闹。

sentences.english: Noise levels have been reduced by 20%.
sentences.chinese: 噪音水平下降了20%。

detailed_translations.english: a sound, especially one that is loud, unpleasant, or frightening

name: key
trans: n. （打字机等的）键；关键；钥匙
vt. 键入；锁上；调节…的音调；提供线索

sentences.english: A bunch of keys hung from his belt.
sentences.chinese: 他的皮带上挂着一串钥匙。

sentences.english: Press the ‘Escape’ key to exit.
sentences.chinese: 按退出键退出。

sentences.english: Check your answers in the key at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 用书后的解答核对答案。

detailed_translations.english: a small specially shaped piece of metal that you put into a lock and turn in order to lock or unlock a door, start a car etc

name: baby
trans: n. 婴儿，婴孩；孩子气的人
vt. 纵容，娇纵；把……当婴儿般对待

sentences.english: Clare is the baby of the family.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔是家里最小的孩子。

detailed_translations.english: a younger child in a family, often the youngest

sentences.english: Blanche heard a crash as the back door was flung open.
sentences.chinese: 布兰奇听见后门哗啦一声被推开。

sentences.english: Did anyone see or hear anything last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚有没有人看见或听见什么？

sentences.english: Old Zeke doesn’t hear too well any more.
sentences.chinese: 老齐克的耳朵已不灵了。

sentences.english: I heard a rumor that he was getting married soon.
sentences.chinese: 我听到传闻，说他马上要结婚了。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院于周二审理了此案。

detailed_translations.english: to know that a sound is being made, using your ears

name: enjoy
trans: vt. 欣赏，享受；喜爱；使过得快活

sentences.english: We thoroughly enjoyed our time in New York.
sentences.chinese: 我们在纽约的时间过得十分快活。

sentences.english: Thanks for a great evening. I really enjoyed it.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你这美好的晚会。我真的玩得很开心。

detailed_translations.english: to get pleasure from something

sentences.english: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.english: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.english: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.english: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action

name: ourselves
trans: pron. 我们自己；我们亲自

sentences.english: We prepared ourselves for the long journey ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.english: It was strange seeing ourselves on television.
sentences.chinese: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking to show that they and one or more other people are affected by their own action

name: mum
trans: n. 妈妈（口语）；沉默；菊花

sentences.english: I have understood my mum. She has done all the things for the sake of me.
sentences.chinese: 现在我对未来充满了信心，我理解了妈妈，她所做的一切都是为了我。

detailed_translations.english: mother

name: myself
trans: pron. 我自己；我亲自；我的正常的健康状况和正常情绪

sentences.english: I blame myself for what has happened.
sentences.chinese: 发生这一切都怪我自己。

sentences.english: I can look after myself.
sentences.chinese: 我可以照顾好自己。

sentences.english: I’m making myself a sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 我在给自己做三明治。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to show that they are affected by their own action

name: themselves
trans: pron. 他们自己；他们亲自

sentences.english: Teachers have no choice but to take measures to protect themselves.
sentences.chinese: 教师们别无选择，只能采取措施来保护自己。

sentences.english: Our neighbours have just bought themselves a jacuzzi.
sentences.chinese: 我们邻居刚刚买了一个按摩浴缸。

sentences.english: The kids seem very pleased with themselves.
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子好像自得其乐。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that the people who do something are affected by their own action

name: himself
trans: pron. 他自己；他亲自，他本人

sentences.english: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.chinese: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.english: He barred himself in.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己关在里面。

sentences.english: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.chinese: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

name: herself
trans: pron. 她自己（she的反身代词）；她亲自

sentences.english: She hurt herself.
sentences.chinese: 她弄伤了自己。

sentences.english: She must be very proud of herself.
sentences.chinese: 她一定非常自豪。

detailed_translations.english: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it

sentences.english: Elsa is telephoning the greengrocer. The plumber is putting a new seat on the toilet bowl.
sentences.chinese: 埃尔莎在给蔬菜水果商打电话，管子工在马桶上装了一个新座垫。

sentences.english: Yet he was rarely in despair. He spoke lATer of his sATisfaction AT seeing signs he had designed hanging above a greengrocer's or butcher's shop.
sentences.chinese: 他虽饥寒交迫，但并不气馁。他后来追述当年的心情时说道，在看到自己设计的招牌悬挂在一家蔬菜水果店或者肉店的上方时，他委实感实心满意足。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a shop selling fruit and vegetables

name: absent
trans: adj. 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的

sentences.english: The dull, absent look on her face implied boredom.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上呆滞、茫然的神情说明她觉得无聊了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的
detailed_translations.english: not at work, school, a meeting etc, because you are sick or decide not to go
to not go to a place or take part in an event where people expect you to be

sentences.english: The president announced Monday that he would cancel the debt.
sentences.chinese: 总统周一宣布他会取消这笔债务。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Sunday and Tuesday

sentences.english: I’ll see you Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 星期二见。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Monday and Wednesday

sentences.english: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.english: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

sentences.english: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Tuesday and Thursday

sentences.english: She was working Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 她星期四在工作。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Wednesday and Friday

name: keep
trans: vt. 保持；经营；遵守；饲养

sentences.english: The noise kept him awake.
sentences.chinese: 噪音使他一直醒着。

sentences.english: I was struggling to keep awake.
sentences.chinese: 我努力不让自己睡着。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in a particular state, condition, or position, or to make someone or something do this

name: spend
trans: vt. 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽

sentences.english: I can’t afford to spend any more money this week.
sentences.chinese: 这星期我没有能力花更多的钱了。

sentences.english: The repairs cost a lot, but it’s money well spent (= a sensible way of spending money ) .
sentences.chinese: 修理费很高，但这是该花的钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽
detailed_translations.english: to use your money to pay for goods or services

name: weekend
trans: n. 周末，周末休假；周末聚会

sentences.english: Are you doing anything nice this weekend?
sentences.chinese: 这个周末你有什么好的安排？

sentences.english: Tony has been unwell over the weekend (= during the weekend ).
sentences.chinese: 托尼这个周末身体不舒服。

sentences.english: We’re going to Paris for a long weekend (= Saturday and Sunday, and also Friday or Monday, or both ).
sentences.chinese: 我们要到巴黎去度一个长周末。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周末，周末休假；周末聚会
detailed_translations.english: Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
to spend the weekend somewhere

sentences.english: Diane won’t be here Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五黛安娜不来这里。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Thursday and Saturday

sentences.english: The festivities begin Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 庆祝活动从星期六开始。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Friday and Sunday

sentences.english: What are you doing Sunday?
sentences.chinese: 你星期天做什么？

detailed_translations.english: the day between Saturday and Monday

name: country
trans: n. 国家，国土；国民；乡下，农村；乡村；故乡
adj. 祖国的，故乡的；地方的，乡村的；国家的；粗鲁的；乡村音乐的

sentences.english: the Scandinavian countries
sentences.chinese: 斯堪的纳维亚国家

sentences.english: developing countries
sentences.chinese: 发展中国家

sentences.english: travelling to a foreign country
sentences.chinese: 到国外旅行

sentences.english: I’ve always wanted to live in the country.
sentences.chinese: 我一直想住在乡下。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is controlled by its own government, president, king etc

sentences.english: I didn’t really know your name – it was just a lucky guess.
sentences.chinese: 我并不知道你的名字―只是运气好猜中的。

sentences.english: a lucky charm
sentences.chinese: 吉祥符

detailed_translations.english: having good luck

name: church
trans: vt. 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

sentences.english: a short church service
sentences.chinese: 简短的教堂礼拜仪式

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a building where Christians go to worship

detailed_translations.chinese: 领…到教堂接受宗教仪式

name: dairy
trans: n. 奶制品；乳牛；制酪场；乳品店；牛奶及乳品业
adj. 乳品的；牛奶的；牛奶制的；产乳的

sentences.english: In my childhood, local dairies bought milk from local farmers.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，本地的乳品公司向当地农场主收购牛奶。

sentences.english: dairy products/produce
sentences.chinese: 乳制品；奶类产品

detailed_translations.english: a place on a farm where milk is kept and butter and cheese are made
made from milk

name: baker
trans: n. 面包师；面包工人；（便携式）烘炉

detailed_translations.chinese: 面包师；面包工人；（便携式）烘炉
detailed_translations.english: someone who bakes bread and cakes, especially in order to sell them in a shop

sentences.english: The cook and the grocer haggled over the price of eggs.
sentences.chinese: 厨师和杂货商为蛋价计较个没完。

sentences.english: He never overcharged when I went shopping in his grocer.
sentences.chinese: 我去他的杂货店买东西时他从不向我乱索价。

sentences.english: Just as our exchanges with the local grocer free us from backbreaking farm work, so do imports from around the world move us even more toward the very economic specialization that enriches us.
sentences.chinese: 就好像我们与当地的杂货店交易，我们就不用非常辛苦地从事农业劳动，来自全世界的进口品让我们更快地走向经济专业化，使我们富裕。

detailed_translations.english: someone who owns or works in a shop that sells food and other things used in the home

name: year
trans: n. 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

name: race
trans: n. 属，种；种族，人种；家庭，门第
vt. 使参加比赛；和…竞赛；使急走，使全速行进
vi. 比速度，参加竞赛；全速行进

sentences.english: The race is on to develop more environmentally friendly forms of energy.
sentences.chinese: 人们正在竞相开发更环保的能源形式。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which one group of people tries to obtain or achieve something before another group does

name: town
trans: n. 城镇，市镇；市内商业区

sentences.english: an industrial town in the Midlands
sentences.chinese: 英格兰中部的一座工业城镇

sentences.english: I walked to the nearest town.
sentences.chinese: 我走到最近的镇上。

detailed_translations.english: a large area with houses, shops, offices etc where people live and work, that is smaller than a city and larger than a village

name: crowd
trans: n. 群众,一伙;一堆,许多,大众
vt. 挤满,将...塞进;催促,催逼

sentences.english: A vast crowd gathered in the main square.
sentences.chinese: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.english: She mingled with the crowd of guests, exchanging greetings.
sentences.chinese: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

sentences.english: Saturday’s game was watched by a capacity crowd (= the maximum number of people that a sports ground etc can hold ) .
sentences.chinese: 星期六的比赛座无虚席。

sentences.english: Troops fired tear gas and shots to disperse a crowd of 15,000 demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 军队发射催泪弹并开枪来驱散15,000名示威群众。

sentences.english: I didn’t know him; he wasn’t one of the usual crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我不认识他，他不是平时那一群人里的。

sentences.english: He wanted to go unnoticed, to be one of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他想默默无闻地做个普通人。

detailed_translations.english: a large group of people who have gathered together to do something, for example to watch something or protest about something

name: stand
trans: n. 站立；立场；看台；停止

sentences.english: It looks like we’ll have to stand – there are no seats left.
sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.english: She stood in the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.english: (= do not move ) and listen to me.
sentences.chinese: 站好别动，听我说。

sentences.english: Don’t just stand there (= stand and not do anything ) – help me!
sentences.chinese: 不要光站在那里，帮帮我！

detailed_translations.english: to support yourself on your feet or be in an upright position
used to say that you do not like someone or something at all, or that you think that something is extremely unpleasant
a piece of furniture or equipment used to hold or support something

name: exciting
trans: adj. 令人兴奋的；使人激动的
v. 激动；刺激（excite的ing形式）；唤起

sentences.chinese: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.english: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel excited

trans: adv. 只是，仅仅；刚才，刚刚；正好，恰好；实在；刚要
adj. 公正的，合理的；正直的，正义的；正确的；公平的；应得的

sentences.english: A good strong cup of coffee is just what I need right now.
sentences.chinese: 我现在正需要喝一杯浓浓的咖啡。

sentences.chinese: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。

sentences.chinese: 她看上去就像她妈妈。

sentences.english: It’s nothing serious – just a small cut.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧，只不过是个小伤口。

sentences.english: John’s just told me that he’s getting married.
sentences.chinese: 约翰刚刚告诉我他要结婚了。

detailed_translations.english: exactly

name: finish
trans: n. 结束；完美；回味（葡萄酒）

sentences.chinese: 没完成家庭作业前你哪儿也不能去。

sentences.english: Have you finished that book yet?
sentences.chinese: 那本书你看完了吗？

sentences.english: ‘How’s the decorating going?’ ‘We’ve nearly finished.’
sentences.chinese: “装修进行得怎么样了？”“差不多快完成了。”

sentences.english: The football season finishes in May.
sentences.chinese: 足球赛季在 5 月份结束。

sentences.english: a dramatic finish to the race
sentences.chinese: 赛跑的戏剧性结局

the end or last part of something

sentences.english: Five lucky winners will each receive a signed copy of the album.
sentences.chinese: 五位幸运的获胜者每人将得到一张签名专辑。

sentences.english: As a jockey he rode 10 winners.
sentences.chinese: 作为骑师他曾十度驾驭获胜赛马。

detailed_translations.english: a person or animal that has won something

sentences.english: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.english: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.chinese: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.english: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.chinese: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.english: Jane shut the door behind her.
sentences.chinese: 简随手关上身后的门。

sentences.english: The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.chinese: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

detailed_translations.english: at or towards the back of a thing or person

name: way
trans: n. 方法；道路；方向；行业；习惯

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.chinese: 他们企图绘制挪威与丹麦之间的海域图。

sentences.english: I think they should be careful about that, but I applaud them for taking up the mantle out there in Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他们应该注意那一点，但是我赞赏他们为填补丹麦在这方面的空白所作出的贡献。

sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，那么在2011年最幸福的国家可能会是像丹麦和瑞士这样富有的国家。

trans: adj. 可怕的；极坏的；使人敬畏的

sentences.english: The weather was awful.
sentences.chinese: 天气很糟糕。

detailed_translations.english: very bad or unpleasant

trans: n. （美）电话；电话机；电话耳机

sentences.chinese: 我正要走，电话铃响了。

to talk to someone by telephone

trans: n. 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
adj. 定时的；定期的；分期的
vt. 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度

sentences.english: Einstein changed the way we think about space and time.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.english: close relationships established over a long period of time
sentences.chinese: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.chinese: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
detailed_translations.english: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

detailed_translations.english: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

sentences.english: Does this answer your requirements?
sentences.chinese: 这个符合你的要求吗？

detailed_translations.english: to be suitable for sth; to match sth

name: last

adj. 最后的；最近的，最新的；仅剩的；最不可能…的
vi. 持续；维持，够用；持久
adv. 最后地；上次，最近；最后一点

sentences.english: I didn’t read the last chapter of the book.
sentences.chinese: 我没有看这本书的最后一章。

sentences.english: Add the flour last.
sentences.chinese: 最后加面粉。

sentences.chinese: 他的工作大部分是通过电话进行的。

sentences.english: Who was that on the phone ?
sentences.chinese: 谁来的电话？

sentences.english: I wish Amy would get off the phone .
sentences.chinese: 我真希望埃米别再打电话了。

detailed_translations.english: a telephone

trans: adv. 又，此外；再一次；再说；增加

sentences.english: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.english: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.chinese: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.chinese: 再说，这些工作坊会令社区很多人受惠。

trans: vt. 讲；说明；例如；声称；假设；指明
vi. 讲；表示；念；假定；背诵

sentences.chinese: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.english: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.chinese: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.english: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.chinese: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.english: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.english: (= why do you think that ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会那么说呢？

sentences.english: I’d like to say a few words (= make a short speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 我想简单地说几句。

sentences.english: ‘So what are your plans now?’‘ I’d rather not say .’
sentences.chinese: “那么你现在的计划是什么？”“我还是不说的好。”

detailed_translations.english: to express an idea, feeling, thought etc using words

sentences.chinese: 我这星期不能见你。

sentences.chinese: 他是在伦敦长大的。

sentences.english: I trained to London.
sentences.chinese: 我乘火车到伦敦。

sentences.english: He hopped to and fro between London and Paris for the business.
sentences.chinese: 为了这笔生意他曾不停地往返于伦敦和巴黎。

sentences.english: I suddenly realized that there was someone following me.
sentences.chinese: 我突然意识到有人跟着我。

sentences.english: George died very suddenly.

trans: vt. 理解；懂；获悉；推断；省略

sentences.chinese: 她不懂英语。

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I don’t understand. Can yon explain that again?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不明白。你能再解释一遍吗？

sentences.english: The woman had a strong accent, and I couldn’t understand what she was saying.
sentences.chinese: 那女人口音很重，我听不懂她在说些什么。

name: speak
trans: vi. 说话；演讲；表明；陈述

sentences.chinese: 我震惊得说不出话来。

sentences.english: He spoke very softly (= quietly ) .
sentences.chinese: 他说话声音非常轻柔。

sentences.english: Steve gripped the steering wheel tightly with both hands.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫双手紧握方向盘。

sentences.english: In her hand was a tattered old photograph.
sentences.chinese: 她手中拿着的是一张破旧的老照片。

sentences.english: the hour hand
sentences.chinese: 时针

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body at the end of your arm, including your fingers and thumb, that you use to hold things

trans: adj. 小型的，袖珍的；金钱上的
vt. 隐藏；忍受；将…放入衣袋

sentences.chinese: 卢克走了进来，双手插在口袋里。

sentences.english: The policeman told me to turn out my pockets (= take everything out of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 警察让我把口袋里的东西都掏出来。

sentences.chinese: 袖珍词典

trans: n. 短语, 习语, 措辞, 乐句
vt. 措词, 将(乐曲)分成乐句

sentences.chinese: 不可能仅通过说某个词或短语就能把人催眠。

sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地摇了摇头。

sentences.english: ‘That’s true,’ said Joe slowly.

vi. [机] 切割；相交；切牌；停拍；不出席

sentences.chinese: 要我切蛋糕吗？

sentences.chinese: 为了减少该地区的街头犯罪，他们安装了闭路电视摄像机。

sentences.chinese: 为了降低成本，提高利润，将削减700个职位。

sentences.chinese: 大航空公司如果想和廉价的航空公司竞争，就需要降低价格。

trans: [复数 goes 第三人称单数 goes 过去式 went 过去分词 gone 现在分词 going]

sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声掉在地板上。

sentences.english: The bullet went flying over my head.
sentences.chinese: 子弹从我头顶飞过。

sentences.english: John went rushing off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 约翰沿走廊飞奔而去。

sentences.english: Her hair is starting to go grey.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发开始变白了。

detailed_translations.english: to move in a particular way, or to do something as you are moving

trans: vt. 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

sentences.chinese: 贝琳达热情地招呼她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

sentences.english: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.chinese: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

detailed_translations.english: used to show how far back in the past something happened

sentences.english: People say the judge had been bought by the Mafia.
sentences.chinese: 人们都说法官被黑手党收买了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest
to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest

sentences.english: earrings, £5 a pair
sentences.chinese: 耳环，5英镑一副

sentences.english: We were each paired with a newcomer to help with training.
sentences.chinese: 我们每个人都和一名新手组对，帮助他们训练。

detailed_translations.english: two things of the same type that are used together
to put people or things into groups of two, or to form groups of two

vt. 使用；改变；做成…的形状

sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

detailed_translations.english: something that is popular or thought to be good at a particular time

sentences.english: This sofa is so uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这张沙发太不舒服了。

detailed_translations.english: not feeling physically comfortable, or not making you feel comfortable

name: wear
trans: v. 穿着；用旧；耗损；面露

sentences.english: The cushions are starting to wear a little.
sentences.chinese: 这些靠垫开始有点磨破了。

sentences.english: His jeans have worn thin at the knees.
sentences.chinese: 他牛仔裤的膝盖处已经磨薄了。

sentences.english: You’ve worn a hole in your sock.
sentences.chinese: 你的袜子磨出了个洞。

name: appointment
trans: n. 任命；约定；任命的职位

sentences.english: All consultations are by appointment only.
sentences.chinese: 就诊必须预约。

sentences.english: Other changes included the appointment of a new Foreign Minister.
sentences.chinese: 其他变动包括任命了一位新的外交部长。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement for a meeting at an agreed time and place, for a particular purpose

sentences.chinese: 他急需治疗。

sentences.english: The report called for urgent action to reduce lead in petrol.
sentences.chinese: 报告呼吁迅速采取行动，减少汽油中的铅含量。

sentences.english: an urgent message
sentences.chinese: 一封急报

detailed_translations.english: very important and needing to be dealt with immediately

sentences.chinese: 你做业务要储备足够的钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: [地理][水文] 冰碛；放钱的抽屉；备用现金
detailed_translations.english: money in the till is money that a company or organization has
until
to prepare land for growing crops

sentences.english: Late-night shopping is becoming very popular.
sentences.chinese: 深夜购物越来越普遍了。

sentences.english: I went on a shopping spree (= went shopping and bought a lot of things ) at the weekend and spent far too much money.
sentences.chinese: 我周末大买特买了一番，花了好多钱。

sentences.english: I’ve got to do some last-minute shopping.
sentences.chinese: 我得去作最后一刻的大采购。

sentences.english: the busy Christmas shopping season
sentences.chinese: 忙碌的圣诞购物季

detailed_translations.english: the activity of going to shops and buying things

sentences.english: Make a list of all the things you have to do.
sentences.chinese: 把你必须做的所有事情列一个清单。

sentences.chinese: 我的名单上排在第一位的是吉林夫人。

sentences.english: The guidebook lists 1,000 hotels and restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 旅游手册上列有1,000家宾馆和餐厅。

sentences.chinese: 新鲜果蔬

sentences.english: organic methods of growing vegetables
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜的有机种植方法

sentences.english: vegetable soup
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜汤

sentences.english: a neat vegetable garden
sentences.chinese: 整洁的菜园

sentences.english: Vitamin A is found in liver and green vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 动物肝脏和绿色蔬菜中含有维生素A。
